CHAPTER 240 Department of Service

240.01Establishment of position of Director.

240.02Powers and duties of the Director.

240.03Division of Maintenance; Public Works; Building Regulation; and Engineering.

CROSS REFERENCES

General provisions - see CHTR. Sec. 7.08

Utilities Committee - see ADM. 220.01 (Rule 11)

Tampering with and theft of utilities - see GEN. OFF. 642.26

Utilities generally - see S. U. & P. S. Ch. 1040

Duties of Director re water - see S. U. & P.S. 1042.06

Underground utilities - see P. & Z. Ch. 1272.22
